result.title: Week #11
result.content:
Hello everyone,

Here's the content of session #11:

Digit DP

Here are the problems we solved on Digit DP:

Count the numbers less than or equal to s with sum of digits = k

Solution: https://ideone.com/hUuboh

Count the numbers less than or equal to s with the multiplication of digits divisible by k (k <= 100000)

Solution: https://ideone.com/D3JlyR

Solution of the last problem from Contest #8:

Using f(r) â€” f(l-1): https://ideone.com/o3tFDi

Another solution in one DP: https://ideone.com/IOhtgm

DFS

Counting the number of components and their sizes: https://ideone.com/QCr3sJ

Finding the path between two nodes: https://ideone.com/JWucvR

Bipartite check -- Coloring a graph using two colors (if possible): https://ideone.com/uJ4SqO

Good luck!
